Description: Critical: Authentication service unresponsive. Users unable to log in to all major applications.
Impacted Components: Authentication Service, Web Portal, Mobile App, API Gateway

Description: Severe: Main customer database experiencing high latency and frequent timeouts. Ordering and account management impacted.
Impacted Components: Customer DB Cluster, Order Processing System, Account Management Module, SF CRM

Description:
Critical: Network outage in primary data center in DACH. All production servers in DC1 are unreachable.
Sites down in Poland/NL
Impacted Components: Core Network Switches (DC1), Production Servers (DC1), Storage Area Network (DC1)

Description: High: Immigration app gateway integration failing intermittently. Customers reporting submission failures.
